logs.title: Cognito Intake
logs.body: Asset SCALAR assigned to HAB-MED Cocoon. Mobility restricted. All output logged.

logs.title: Power Audit
logs.body: Facility power budgets are not for evac. They are for containment.

logs.title: Recovery Directive
logs.body: Inspector M. Halden authorized to reclaim SCALAR property intact.

logs.title: Missing Crew Note
logs.body: Crew morale fractured. Someone keeps calling the station 'home'.

logs.title: Transit Window
logs.body: Orbital window opens in 14 cycles. Prepare HAB-MED staging.

logs.title: Blacksite Inventory
logs.body: Fuel, rations, and data cores secured in storage wing.
